import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0
open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat Filter
theorem cauchy_schwarz_holder {n : ℕ} (μ ν : Fin n → ℝ) (hμ_nonneg : ∀ i, 0 ≤ μ i) (hν_nonneg : ∀ i, 0 ≤ ν i)
    {p q : ℝ} (hp : 1 < p) (hq : q = p / (p - 1)) :
    (∑ i, μ i * ν i) ≤ (∑ i, (μ i) ^ p) ^ (1 / p) * (∑ i, (ν i) ^ q) ^ (1 / q) := by
  have l1 : 1 / p + 1 / q = 1 := by
    rw [hq]
    field_simp
    have : p - 1 ≠ 0 := by linarith [hp]
    have : p ≠ 0 := by linarith [hp]
    field_simp
    ring
  sorry  -- skipped due to previous failure
